item.title: Analyzing PFsense logs in Graylog4
item.description: We will parse the log records generated by the PfSense Firewall. We already have our graylog server running and we will start preparing the terrain to capture those logs records.

item.title: Analyzing PFsense logs in Graylog3
item.description: We will parse the log records generated by the PfSense Firewall. We already have our graylog server running and we will start preparing the terrain to capture those logs records.

item.title: Configure OpenVPN HA opnsense cluster
item.description: In this LAB I’ll be creating OpenVPN SSL Peer to Peer connection.

item.title: Configure opnsense nextcloud backup
item.description: In this LAB I’ll be configurate the opnsense cloud backup solutuon for nextcloud.

item.title: Configurate HA opnsense cluster
item.description: In this post I will configure 2 opnsense server to a HA cluster.
